name: Codename Attila
description:
Codename Attila is a First TPS Shooter Survivors-like game where you fight off enemy hordes and do your best to survive while enhancing your character with your money. Play as Attila and upgrade your abilities and unlock new skills with the money you acquire at the end of each match. Demonstrate your superiority against your enemies.

Codename Attila intertwines TPS Shooter mechanics with Roguelite elements, offering enjoyable moments with its intense and engaging action.
